1954 Soccer World Cup - Group 1, First Round

National teams, games, goals and standings from Group 1 of the first round stage played in the 1954 FIFA World Cup, including details of points, games won and lost and goals scored and received.

Group 1, National Teams


Brazil
France
Mexico
Yugoslavia

Group 1, Standings

Standing National Team PTS GP W D L GS GA GD Qualified
1. Brazil 3 2 1 1 0 6 1 5 Yes
2. Yugoslavia 3 2 1 1 0 2 1 1 Yes
3. France 2 2 1 0 1 3 3 0 No
4. Mexico 0 2 0 0 2 2 8 -6 No

Group 1, Games Played

Game Date Results
1. Jun 16, 1954 Brazil 5 - 0 Mexico
    Baltazar - 23'
    Didi - 30'
    Pinga - 34'
    Pinga - 43'
    Julinho - 69'
2. Jun 16, 1954 Yugoslavia 1 - 0 France
    Milos Milutinovic - 15'
3. Jun 19, 1954 Brazil 1 - 1 Yugoslavia
(0-0) on extra time
    48' - Branko Zebec
    Didi - 69'
4. Jun 19, 1954 France 3 - 2 Mexico
    Jean Vincent - 19'
    Raul Cardenas (own goal) - 46'
    54' - Jose Lamadrid
    85' - Tomas Balcazar
    Raymond Kopa (pen) - 88'

Abbreviations:
PTS = Points / GP = Games played / W = Wins / D = Draws / L = Losses
GF = Goals For / GA = Goals against / GD = Goal Difference

Note: until the 1990 World Cup each win was worth 2 points, after that each win is worth 3 points.
